benchmark_details.name: MultiAPI
benchmark_details.overview: MultiAPI is a pioneering comprehensive large-scale API benchmark dataset aimed at expanding LLMsâ€™ proficiency in multimodal contexts. It consists of 235 diverse API calls and 2,038 contextual prompts, providing a unique platform for evaluating tool-augmented LLMs handling multimodal tasks.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate Large Language Models' ability to handle multimodal tasks using external API functions and to enhance LLMs' capabilities.

data.source: Constructed from the HuggingFace instruction-code dataset.
data.annotation: Human refinement and verification of model descriptions and generated instructions.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on function calls selected by LLMs in response to user instructions.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy values indicate better performance in correctly identifying the necessary API functions and their arguments.
methodology.validation: Evaluated through comprehensive experiments involving both API-based and open-source LLMs.
